biotools.summary: Retrieve similar sequences beginning from DNA, RNA or Proteins as well as free text - meaning there is no need to set any preliminary search parameters or filters which restrict the search space. Out of the box your search in parallel 11 of the most popular databases. Average alignment takes less then 3 seconds. Adding your own database is as simple as a click of the button.

bioschemas.name: Retrieve and Relate
